# HfiPcieGen3 ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 


### Description

This was provided by Intel Corporation and revoked Jul-20
- **UUID**: 1387dafb-6dad-48b4-a186-98e52cac74b7
- **Created**: 2023-05-22
- **Author**: Michael Haag
- **Acknowledgement**:  | [](https://twitter.com/)

{{< button "https://github.com/magicsword-io/LOLDrivers/raw/main/drivers/36218d733c0afdd2d6dce6f616335a2f.bin" "Download" >}}
{{< tip "warning" >}}

{{< /tip >}}

### Commands

```
bcdedit /copy &#34;{current}&#34; /d &#34;LOLDrivers&#34; | {% if ($_ -match &#39;{\S+}&#39;) { bcdedit /set $matches[0] path \windows\temp\HfiPcieGen3 } }
```


| Use Case | Privileges | Operating System | 
|:---- | ---- | ---- |
| Persistence |  | 64-bit |
